## hpr1992 :: How I'm handling my podcast-subscriptions and -listening

 
podget https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/podget-git
rennpod https://gitlab.com/swegryps/rennpod
puddletag https://puddletag.sourceforge.net
toogg https://gitlab.com/swegryps/toogg
opconv https://gitlab.com/swegryps/opconv
spalt https://gitlab.com/swegryps/spalt
Rockbox https://www.rockbox.org
https://listenlive.nl

Editor's Note 2018-06-12: The links above which previously referenced GitHub
have been updated to reflect the new location of the software, GitLab.
